configuration.reportName: VISIONET
configuration.styles:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jstree/3.2.1/themes/default/style.min.css" />
            body { background: #fff !important; user-select: none !important; font-family: Poppins !important; }
            .featherlight-image { cursor: help; }
            .report-name { padding-left: 10px; }
            .report-name > img { float: left; height: 90%; margin-left: 30px; margin-top: 2px; width: auto; background-image: url("https://www.visionet.com/"); }
            .report-img { cursor: zoom-in; width: auto; height: auto; max-width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.30); background-color: #dc199b; background-blend-mode: multiply; margin-top: 43px; }
            .dark nav, .dark .side-nav { background: #ce0000; }
            nav { background-color: #353b5f !important; padding-left: 70px; position: fixed; z-index: 1; }
            h5.details-name { color: #58595b; text-transform: capitalize; }
            thead > tr > th { text-align: center; color: #fff !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-family: Poppins !important; background-color: #353b5f !important; border: 1px solid #cbcdd6; }
            li.analysis.waves-effect.active { background: #15238f; }
            ul#slide-out { background: #353b5f !important; }
            .nav-right li { border-left: 0px solid #fff !important; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 10px; }
            .nav-right li { color: #fff !important }
            .side-nav.fixed a, .side-nav li > a { color: #fff !important }
            a.test-view { color: #ce0000 !important; }
            .side-nav li.active { background-color: #e26856 !important }
            .side-nav li:hover { background-color: rgba(226, 104, 86, 0.5) !important }
            .logo-container { display: none; }
            li.theme-selector { display: none !important; }
            .blue-grey.lighten-3 { background-color: #353b5f !important; color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #cbcdd6; border-radius: 6px !important; font-family: Poppins; }
            .blue-grey.lighten-2 { background-color: #353b5f !important; }
            .red.lighten-2 { background-color: #e26856 !important; color: #fff !important; border: 1px solid #cbcdd6; border-radius: 6px !important; font-family: Poppins; }
            .green.lighten-2 { background-color: #fff !important; font-family: Poppins; color: #353b5f !important; border: 1px solid #cbcdd6; border-radius: 6px; }
            .col.s12.m12.l4.fh > div { box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 20%), 0 6px 20px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 19%); overflow: auto ! important; word-break: break-word; border-bottom: 8px solid #e26856; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%); border-radius: 6px !important; }
            .col.s12.m12.l4.fh span.panel-name { color: #13162a; font-family: Poppins; }
            .col.s12.m12.l4.fh span.pass-percentage { color: #13162a; font-family: Poppins; }
            .col.s12.m12.l4.fh > div > span.pass-percentage panel-lead { color: white; font-family: "Arial"; }
            .card-panel table > tbody td:nth-child(1) { font-family: Poppins; color: #353b5f ! important; border: 1px solid #13162a; }
            .card-panel, .card { background: #f0f1f1; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: black; background: linear-gradient(to var(--form-gradient-direction), var(--form-gradient-start-color), var(--form-gradient-end-color)); box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 20%), 0 6px 20px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 19%); overflow: auto !important; word-break: break-word; max-height: fit-content ! important; height: fit-content ! important; }
            .col.l2.m4.s6 { border-radius: 5px; }
            .card-panel table > tbody td:nth-child(2) { font-family: Poppins; color: #353b5f !important; border: 1px solid #13162a !important;}
            .label.outline { border: 1px solid !important; border-radius: 3px !important; margin-top: 0 !important; padding: 2px 5px !important; }
            .panel-lead { display: block; font-size: 50px; text-align: center; }
            body { background: #fff !important; user-select: none !important; }
            #dashboard-view .progress { margin-top: 0px; }
            td.timestamp { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) !important; }
            td.status { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) ! important; }
            .card-panel.heading > h5 { display: none; }
            .card-panel.heading:after { display: inline; content: "Feature File Names"; text-transform: capitalize; color: #13162a; font-size: 20px; font-family: Poppins; font-weight: bold; }
            .featherlight .featherlight-close-icon { position:absolute; z-index:9999; top:0; right:0; line-height:25px; width:25px; cursor:pointer; text-align:center; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background: #f03861; background: rgb(226, 104, 86); color: #fff ! important; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 100%; }
            span.featherlight-close-icon.featherlight-close:hover { transform: rotate(45deg); }
            div#dashboard-view .label.outline { background: #fff ! important; color: #42486f ! important; border-color: #939598 ! important; border-width: 1.59375px ! important; background-size: auto ! important; cursor: pointer; margin-bottom: 7px ! important; }
            div#dashboard-view .label.outline:hover { border-color: #202429 !important; }
            .status.skip, .skip > i { color: gold ! important; }
            .status.fail, .fail i { color: #FC100D; }
            .featherlight .featherlight-content { position: relative; text-align: left; vertical-align: middle; display: inline-block; overflow: unset ! important; padding: 25px 25px 0; border-bottom: 25px solid transparent; min-width: 30%; margin-left: 5%; margin-right: 5%; max-height: 95%; background: unset ! important; cursor: auto; white-space: normal; }
            .footer { left: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; background-color: #353b5f !important; height: 62px; position: fixed; text-align: start; line-height: 24.96px; z-index: 1; }
            @media (max-width: 768px) { .footer { height: 48px; line-height: 18px; } .footer > .block-2 { padding: 10px; font-size: x-small; } }
            .footer > div { text-align: end; line-height: normal; width: 100%; cursor: none; position: fixed; font-family: Poppins; font-size: small; color: white; padding: 22px 16px 22px 97px; }
            @media (max-width: 768px) { .footer > div { padding: 10px; font-size: x-small; text-align: center; } }
            .footer > .block-2 { color: white; font-family: Poppins; font-size: small; line-height: initial; display: inline-table; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; min-height: 10em; padding: 22px 16px 22px 97px; text-align: start; }
            .side-nav { background: #f3f3f3 ! important; transition-duration: .25s; top: 95px; width: 60px; }
            .container { padding-left: 57px !important; max-width: none !important; width: 100% !important; padding-top: 101px !important; margin: auto !important; box-sizing: border-box ! important; }
            @media (max-width: 768px) { .container { padding-top: 100px !important; } }
            @media (max-width: 480px) { .container { padding-top: 50px !important; } }
            .col._addedCell1 { width: auto !important; }
            @media (max-width: 768px) { div#test-details-wrapper { display: flex; align-items: center; position: relative; z-index: 1; overflow: auto; flex-wrap: wrap; width: 100% !important; margin-top: 350px; left: 12px; overflow-y: scroll; overflow-wrap: break-word; max-height: 200px; } }
            @media (max-width: 768px) { .col._addedCell1 { width: 100% !important; max-width: 86% !important; overflow: auto ! important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; z-index: 1 !important; margin-bottom: 20px !important; position: fixed !important; margin-top: 53px; } }
            @media only screen and (max-width: 992px) .side-nav.fixed { left: 0% ! important; margin-top: 105px ! important; }
            .Copyrights { color: white; padding-left: 30% !important; line-height: inherit !important; font-size: smaller; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle; min-height: 10em; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; min-height: 10em; }
            sup { top: -0.3em; color: floralwhite; font-weight: 900; font-family: auto; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; min-height: 10em; }
            td.step-details { white-space: break-spaces !important; height: 300px; padding: 10px; overflow-x: auto !important; width: auto ! important; font-weight: normal ! important; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) !important; border: 1px solid #13162a ! important; max-width: 100% ! important; }
            .test-steps th:nth-child(4) { visibility: hidden; position: relative; padding-right: 223px; max-width: 100px ! important; width: auto ! important; border: 1px solid #13162a ! important; color: #13162a ! important; }
            .test-steps th:nth-child(4):after { content: "ScreenShort"; visibility: visible; position: relative; padding-left: 0px; }
            .test-steps th:nth-child(3) { visibility:hidden; position:relative; max-width:100px ! important; width:auto !important; border:1px solid #13162a ! important; color:#13162a ! important; font-family: Poppins !important; text-align:left; }
            .test-steps th:nth-child(3):after { content: "Test Steps"; visibility:visible; position:absolute; }
            td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar-track { -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.9); border-radius: 10px; background-color: #CCCCCC; }
            td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar { background-color: #fff; }
            td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { border-radius: 10px; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) !important;; background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(226, 104, 86, 0.4) 50%, transparent, transparent); }
            td.step-name { word-wrap: break-word; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0,0,0,0); background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) ! important; font-family: Poppins; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.25rem; margin: 0; position:relative; text-align:left; padding-top:50px; border: 1px solid #13162a ! important; }
            .test-desc { margin-bottom: 10px; color: chocolate; font-family: cursive; font-weight: 500; }
            .json-key { color: #ba4360; }
            .json-value { color: green; }
            .json-string { color: #7298c5; }
            td.step-details > div { color: #353b5f ! important; }
            td.status { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f6e8e6 0%, #fff 100%) ! important }
            div#error_response { color: #eb3941; }
            div#refer_resp { color: #1a0dab; font-size: xx-small; cursor: pointer; }
            span#hand_icon { font-size: small; }
            div#refer_resp:hover { text-decoration: underline !important; }
            ::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 5px; height: 5px; }
            ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { border-radius: 10px; background-color: #353b5f !important; background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(226, 104, 86, 0.4) 50%, transparent, transparent); }
            ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background-color: #fff; }
            .test-steps th:first-child, .test-steps td:first-child { text-align: left !important; max-width: 100px !important; width: auto ! important; border: 1px solid #13162a !important; color: #13162a !important; font-family: Poppins !important; }
            .status i { font-size: 3rem ! important; }
            .card.green-accent { top: 50px ! important; width: 97% ! important; background: #f7f7f7 ! important; color: #13162a ! important; font-family: Poppins ! important; border-radius: 6px ! important; height: 100px ! important; }
            .test-name, .category-name { font-size: 14px ! important; font-family: Poppins ! important; }
            .card.pink-accent { top: 50px ! important; text-align: end ! important; background: #f7f7f7 ! important; color: #13162a ! important; font-family: Poppins ! important; border-radius: 6px ! important; height: 100px ! important; }
            span#innerdiv { padding-left: 10px; font-weight: bolder; padding-right: 6px; color: blue; cursor: pointer; }
            thead { word-break: keep-all !important; }
            .status.info, .info > i { color: #006daf; }
            nav::after { content: ''; display: block; width: 100%; height: 0px; background-color: #4b0050; position: sticky; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 9999; }
            .side-nav li:hover a, .side-nav li.active a { color: #fff !important; }
            span#innerdiv:hover { color: navy; }
            .wrapper { background: #fff; height: 100%; overflow: auto; margin-bottom: 25% !important; }
            .test-steps th:nth-child(2), .test-steps td:nth-child(2) { text-align: left !important; max-width: 100px ! important; width: auto ! important; border: 1px solid #13162a ! important; color: #13162a ! important; font-family: Poppins ! important; }
            table.bordered > thead > tr, table.bordered > tbody > tr { border: none; }
            th, td { border-bottom: 0px solid #ddd ! important; color: #222 ! important; }
            .test-body .collapsible > li.active { border: none ! important; background: #fdfdfd ! important; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16), 0 2px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) ! important; }
            .system-view .card-panel thead > tr > th { border: 1px solid #13162a ! important; background-color: #353b5f ! important; }
            table.bordered.table-results thead > tr > th { background-color: #fff ! important; }
            #dashboard-view.row .col { margin-bottom: 80px ! important; }
            .system-view > .col.l4.m12.s12 { float: none ! important; right: 0; display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; position: relative; }
            @media (max-width: 992px) { .system-view > .col.l4.m12.s12 { right: auto; } }
            .card.suite-total-tests, .card.suite-total-steps, .card.suite-total-time-current, .card.suite-total-time-overall { height: 100px ! important; top: 50px ! important; background: #f0f1f1; color: #353b5f ! important; font-family: Poppins ! important; }
        	.status.pass, .pass > i {color: #32CD32 !important;}
        	.category-summary-view{display: none;}
